Description: DJ GEAR INSTRUMENT GEAR LIVE SOUND RECORDING MICROPHONES HEADPHONES ACCESSORIES SOFTWARE LIGHTING BUNDLES Authorized Dealer - Full Warranty Sterling by Music Man SILO3-BK-M1 Silhouette in Black - Used Sterling 6 String Electric Guitar in Black - Used - Description A versatile workhorse of a guitar that looks, plays, sounds and feels like an instrument three times its price! Packed with features unheard of at this price point, the Silo3 is a real eye opener for the competition, and a tremendous value for the customer, whether its a first time buyer or a seasoned player. Classic, Attractive Body The Silo3, based on the Music Man Silhouette, is a versatile workhorse of a guitar that looks, sounds, feels and plays like an instrument many times its' price. Affordable Yet Amazing H/S/S pickup configuration with 5 way switching, and Tone/Volume controls give the Silo3 a tremendous versatility and value at an incredible price point. Fully Adjustable Fulcrum Tremolo The vintage style tremolo bridge has a comfortable area to rest your palm on, and the solid saddles offer adjustments for height and intonation. Features/Specs Model : SILO3 Body Wood : Basswood Body Color : Black Bridge : Fulcrum Tremolo Pickguard : White Scale Length : 25-1/2" (64.8cm) Neck Radius : 12" (30.5cm) Frets : 22 Frets, Narrow Neck Width : 1.65"(42mm) at Nut Neck Wood : Hard Maple Fingerboard : Hard Maple (BK), Jatoaba (TBS) Fret Markers : Dots Tuning Machines : Diecast Truss Rod : Single Action Neck Attachment : 5 Bolts Controls : 1 Volume, 1 Tone Switching : 5-way Toggle Pickup Selector Pickups : HSS Strings : .009-.042 Gig Bag : N/A We are authorized dealers for all these brands.
